summary:
CURRENT VERSION - God of Giants

OLD VERSION - The Big Giant
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Follow my other mod[/size]
[color=#00FF00]RUZ ENB FUSION: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16661
RUZ ENB CINEMATIC FUSION: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17319[/color]

[size=4]Follow me on Steam[/size] 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12345                                          


[size=5]   CURRENT VERSION - [color=#FF0000]God of Giants [/color] [/size]

[color=#FF0000][size=3]WARNINGS: [/color] [/size]
[size=2]-This version should only be used after completing the main story[/size]
[size=2]-I recommend the mod \"Door To Heaven\" ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9820 ) to reach Sovngarde.[/size]
[size=2]-Delete the old file [/size]

[color=\"#990000\"][size=3]UPDATES:[/color] [/size]
 -EDITED The Big Giant next to Dustmans Cairn: now it\'s stronger, a little smaller (this improved the gameplay) and now it called \"God of Giants\"

-ADDED \"The Real God of Giants\" to Sovngarde, the Stronghest enemy of the game

-EDITED Sovngard: West Sovngard now is a little different (this improved the battle against the giant)

-ADDED a reward if you defeat the giants:
-   If you kill the earthly God of Giant the reward will be a \"Big Giant\'s Toe\" and the \"Spell Tome: Conjure Giant\" that adds a new power (not spell).
-   If you kill The Real God of Giant the reward will be a \"God of Giants\' Toe\" and the \"Spell Tome: Conjure God of Giant\" that adds a new power (not spell).

-ADDED also Skjor and Astrid to Sovngarde



                                         [size=4]  OLD VERSION - [color=#FF0000]The Big Giant[/color] [/size]

This Mod adds a strong Big Giant next to Dustman\'s Cairn
author: RUZ
